title: [Question]Messed up my ID card picture
content:
I uploaded a screenshot instead of my picture in the pesu academy app, now I cant change.
What do I do to change it?
Pls help

comments.body: Is that going to be our id card picture ? , i uploaded my picture which was like 3 years old lol ðŸ˜‚
I uploaded a random screenshot, it's not a pic of me, so how do I change it
Idk too bruh , maybe it's not going to be on the id card
They'll send notification to change dw
Ask them first before they start printing it out, after that it's not possibleÂ
Just email them is pesu support or go to the 13th floor office in BE block , that's how I got mine fixed
